content: आसंज् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To fasten, fix on, attach to, join or add to, place or put on (dress, armour &c.); चापमासज्य कंठे <ls>Ku. 2. 64</ls>; अनुबंध आसज्यते <ls>Sk.</ls>; आसज्यमानेक्षणः <ls>Ś. 3. 26</ls> with the eyes intently fixed; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); भुजे… स भूमेर्धुरमाससंज <ls>R. 2. 74</ls>; so पुत्रे राज्यं; जने दोषं &c.; आससंज भयं तेषां <ls>Bk. 14. 104</ls> fear overtook them. {@--2@} To confer upon, conduce to; <ls>Ki. 13. 44.</ls> {@--3@} To stick or adhere to, depend upon. {@--4@} To take up. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to attach, have anything fastened or put on. {@--2@} To place, put, throw round; आसंजयामास यथाप्रदेशं कंठे गुणं <ls>R. 6. 83.</ls> {@--3@} To entrust or appoint. {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} (सज्यते) To adhere, stick, be attached; यदि नेष्टात्मनः पीडा मासजि भवता जने <ls>Ki. 11. 29</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> “Do unto others as you would be done by.”.
